## Description {#details}

Tuple of metadata.

This is the simple <em><a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/mdnode">MDNode</a></em> arbitrary tuple. Nodes are uniqued by default based on their operands.

Definition at line 1479 of file <a href="/docs/api/files/include/include/llvm/include/llvm/ir/metadata-h">Metadata.h</a>.

### getTemporary() {#ac2e84f7e25af6e1de8cb811a57c6ee29}

<MemberDefinition
  prototype={<>static TempMDTuple llvm::MDTuple::getTemporary (<a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/llvmcontext">LLVMContext</a> &amp; Context, <a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/arrayref">ArrayRef</a>&lt; <a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/metadata">Metadata</a> &#42; &gt; MDs)</>}
  labels = {["inline", "static"]}>
Return a temporary node.

For use in constructing cyclic <a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/mdnode">MDNode</a> structures. A temporary <a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/mdnode">MDNode</a> is not uniqued, may be RAUW&#39;d, and must be manually deleted with deleteTemporary.

Definition at line <a href="/docs/api/files/include/include/llvm/include/llvm/ir/metadata-h/#l01526">1526</a> of file <a href="/docs/api/files/include/include/llvm/include/llvm/ir/metadata-h">Metadata.h</a>.
</MemberDefinition>
